title: Find Latest Group of Size M
content:
Given an array  that represents a permutation of numbers from 1 to . You have a binary string of size  that initially has all its bits set to zero.
At each step  (assuming both the binary string and  are 1-indexed) from 1 to , the bit at position  is set to 1. You are given an integer  and you need to find the latest step at which there exists a group of ones of length . A group of ones is a contiguous substring of 1s such that it cannot be extended in either direction.
Return the latest step at which there exists a group of ones of length exactly . If no such group exists, return .
 








 





All integers in  are distinct.
